sentences.en: But enough of this . Homely truth is unpalatable.
sentences.cn: 得了,忠言逆耳,不说这些了.

sentences.en: Confucius said: just as bitter medicine cures sickness, so unpalatable advice benefits conduct.
sentences.cn: 子曰: 良药苦于利于病, 忠言逆耳利于行.

sentences.en: He believed in the religion which he taught , harsh , unpalatable , uncharitable as that religion was.
sentences.cn: 他相信自己宣讲的那种宗教信仰,虽然那种信仰严厉讨厌, 苛刻无情.

sentences.en: His views on capital punishment are unpalatable to many.
sentences.cn: 他对死刑存废的见解许多人都不以为然.

sentences.en: His views on divorce are unpalatable to many women.
sentences.cn: 他对离婚的看法是很多妇女无法接受的.

sentences.en: It was only then that I began to learn the unpalatable truth about John.
sentences.cn: 直到那时我才开始了解到有关约翰的一些令人难以接受的实情。

sentences.en: Just as bitter medicine cures sickness , so unpalatable advice benefits conduct.
sentences.cn: 忠言逆耳利于行,良药苦口利于病.

sentences.en: Only then did I learn the unpalatable truth.
sentences.cn: 直到那时我才得知令人难以接受的真相。

sentences.en: Other gauges of inflation also brought an unpalatable message.
sentences.cn: 确实,愈研究这些数字就会越觉得它们非常恼人.

sentences.en: People cannot bear the metal and unpalatable flavor in the intensified foods.
sentences.cn: 在强化型食品中出现的金属味或无味是不能让人接受的.

sentences.en: Sincere advice , though seemingly unpalatable, must be followed.
sentences.cn: 药石之言, 爱听不听.

sentences.en: The unpalatable truth is that the team isn’t getting any better.
sentences.cn: 让人难以接受的事实是这个队没有任何进步。

sentences.en: There is a natural human instinct to protect people unpalatable things.
sentences.cn: 保护人们免遭厄运是人的天性.

sentences.en: They must be told the truth, however unpalatable it may be.
sentences.cn: 必须把事实告诉他们, 不论它是令人难以接受的.

sentences.en: To Beijing this an unpalatable option for a number of reasons.
sentences.cn: 有许多原因可以让北京认为这不是什么好主意.

words.tran_cn: 味道差的，难吃的；讨人厌的，使人不快的

trans.tran_cn: 味道差的，不好吃的，无味
